title: Tao Gong | Northwestern Health Sciences University
author: Gong
description: Tao Gong teaches in the college of Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine at Northwestern Health Sciences University,
cleaned_text: [ All Faculty](https://www.nwhealth.edu/faculty/) Tao Gong, MS, LAc Education - M.S., Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine Certifications Dip, LAc (NCCAOM) Awards Teacher of the year in 2017, 2014, 2004. NWHSU, First prize of the National 95 Key Research Project (Treatment of Vascular Dementia Using Chinese Herbs).awarded by the National Ministry of Education of China, 2002, Second prize: awarded by the National Ministry of Science and Technological Advancement of China, 2001, Second prize: awarded by Tianjin Ministry of Science and Technological Advancement in China, 2002
